actions-list.header: ANNOUNCEMENT OF RESULT OF ROLL CALL 6
actions-list.actionItem: The Clerk announced that no persons having received a majority of the whole number of votes cast by surname in the Election of the Speaker, a Speaker was not elected.

Pursuant to law and precedent, the Clerk directed the Reading Clerk to call the roll anew. Accordingly, the Honorable Warren Davidson of Ohio placed the name of the Honorable Kevin McCarthy into nomination for the Office of Speaker, the Honorable Pete Aguilar of California placed the name of the Honorable Hakeem S. Jeffries into nomination for the Office of Speaker, and the Honorable Lauren Boebert of Colorado placed the name of the Honorable Byron Donalds into nomination for the Office of Speaker. No other nominations were put forward.

actions-list.header: ANNOUNCEMENT OF RESULT OF ROLL CALL 5
actions-list.actionItem: The Clerk announced that no persons having received a majority of the whole number of votes cast by surname in the Election of the Speaker, a Speaker was not elected.

Pursuant to law and precedent, the Clerk directed the Reading Clerk to call the roll for the Election of the Speaker. Accordingly, the Honorable Mike Gallagher of Wisconsin placed the name of the Honorable Kevin McCarthy into nomination for the Office of Speaker, the Honorable Pete Aguilar of California placed the name of the Honorable Hakeem S. Jeffries into nomination for the Office of Speaker, and the Honorable Chip Roy of Texas placed the name of the Honorable Byron Donalds into nomination for the Office of Speaker. No other nominations were put forward.
Ms. Stefanik made a point of order that a quorum was not present. Accordingly, Members-elect were counted and the Clerk announced that 351 Members-elect being counted, a quorum was present.
The Clerk led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
The Clerk announced approval of the Journal.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
